tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    flight_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    flight_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT,
    distance_km DECIMAL,
    weather_conditions VARCHAR(50),
    pilot_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE drone_missions (
  mission_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_date DATE,
  drone_id INT,
  mission_duration INT,
  target_location VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  mission_id INT,
  flight_start TIMESTAMP,
  flight_end TIMESTAMP,
  altitude INT,
  distance_covered INT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_missions (
    mission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name VARCHAR(255),
    drone_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    altitude FLOAT,
    speed FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_missions (
    mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name STRING,
    drone_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    mission_status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE flight_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id UUID,
    flight_date DATE,
    altitude INT,
    distance FLOAT,
    speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_performance (
    performance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID,
    flight_duration INTERVAL,
    battery_level INT,
    signal_strength FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE mission_analysis (
    analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_id UUID,
    analysis_date DATE,
    performance_rating INT,
    trend_analysis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID,
    start_location VARCHAR(255),
    end_location VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    distance FLOAT,
    successful BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model VARCHAR(255),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
    registration_number VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE operators (
    operator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    operator_name VARCHAR(255),
    operator_license VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE missions (
    mission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id UUID,
    operator_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_id UUID,
    speed FLOAT,
    altitude FLOAT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    humidity FLOAT
)
